TopicTitle: A way to Unload Busted Parts

Articles.Content: Is there a way to unload parts that don't work anymore - or if the texture is broken? I'm referring to the in-game ALT+12 menu thingy. I saw how you reload them, but I couldn't find an unload. Wanted to make sure before I just went and nuked them out of the old parts folder

Important tip for upgraders:

Do not copy your .20 folder into your existing .19 folder! Instead, make a new folder for .20 and copy your saves and your ships from .19 into it.

(I just spent the better part of an hour figuring this out for myself. ; )
